skills.name: Fierce Shelling (熾烈放火)
text: When entering a battle, add a stack of 5% increased Crit Rate. Adds 1 stack every 10 seconds after, up to 10 times.
During a [Main Battery salvo], if an enemy is sunk, immediately repairs North Carolina by 20% of Max HP and increases damage of next [Main Battery Salvo] by 30%.

skills.name: Protect (援護)
text:
If a friendly ship is under a [Main Battery] attack, and if North Carolina has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill. 
Takes the incoming damage instead and reduces it by 80%. Can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Air Cover (航空直掩隊)
text: During battle, after an [Airstrike] has been launched, 100% chance to reduce North Carolina's [Main Battery] CD by 10 seconds. Can only proc 3 times per battle.
